mods.note: After reading the above I can only offer you my deepest apologies for asking you to ride in a dusty car.It is most gratifying though to see our [illegible] in a fitting role.Am coming up Monday and expecting some real excitement. See that youall don't disappoint me so I will have some real first class data to take back to New York.If you are coming to Chattanooga that night, or [illegible] afternoon, glad to drive you down. Expect to be at the Mineral Springs Hotel. Sincerely, Madalin P. Johnson.
